title: Apply for, renew or update a UK passport

details.overview: You can apply for, update or renew a passport online
details.more_information:
You can't use this service if you are travelling within the next 4 weeks - you'll need to use the [1-week or 1-day service](passport-quick "Get a passport quickly").

*[IPS]: Identity and Passport Service
details.introduction:
You can complete an online application form to apply for, renew or update a passport.

The pre-printed application form will then be returned to you to sign, date, add any documents or photographs that are needed, and return for processing.
details.will_continue_on: the Identity and Passport Service (IPS) website
